mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.tyshxydm AS "tyshxydm", a.zzjgdm AS "zzjgdm", a.name AS "name", a.cellphone AS "cellphone", a.password AS "password", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM [WJSJZX].[dbo].[corp_basic_account] a
(a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} or a.del_flag is null)
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO [WJSJZX].[dbo].[corp_basic_account]( tyshxydm, zzjgdm, name, cellphone, password, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, del_flag, remarks ) VALUES ( #{tyshxydm}, #{zzjgdm}, #{name}, #{cellphone}, #{password}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE [WJSJZX].[dbo].[corp_basic_account] SET tyshxydm = #{tyshxydm}, zzjgdm = #{zzjgdm}, name = #{name}, cellphone = #{cellphone}, password = #{password}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
